desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.thai: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.ko: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>咨询。真紀回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理社>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理会>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.thai: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.ko: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真紀通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真理会的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃的游戏存档不可恢复，桃听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.thai: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.ko: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
desc.zh_tw: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.thai: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.ko: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.zh_tw: 真紀认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理社也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千禧年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理会也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Contraband Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she knew some intel about C&C.
desc.jp: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Contraband Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she knew some intel about C&C.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀向开发部解释了现状：“镜子”被保存在学生会的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C负责看守那里。桃井听后立刻决定撤退，但小玉突然说自己知道C&C的一些消息。

desc.en: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president - the real deal Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.jp: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president - the real deal Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.

desc.ko: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president - the real deal Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.zh_tw: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“寧瑠”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“尼禄”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“妮露”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.jp: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.thai: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.ko: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.zh_tw: 優香得知寧瑠不在，大为震撼。然而朱音向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香得知尼禄不在，大为震撼。然而茜向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香得知宁瑠不在，大为震撼。然而朱音向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香得知妮露不在，大为震撼。然而茜向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。

desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.jp: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.thai: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.ko: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但綠已经决定：遊戲開發部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。愛麗絲从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程師部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.zh_tw: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.en: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.jp: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.thai: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.ko: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音好奇優香从何得知的消息，優香则狡猾地笑着表示，是貝里塔斯的部长陽葵告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是真理社的部长日鞠告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是真理会的部长日鞠告诉她的。
